alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 3:54AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, southern Monroe, northern Crawford and southwestern Jones Counties through 430 AM EST... At 354 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Sandy Point, or near Roberta, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Roberta, Payne, Culloden, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Bolingbroke, Dames Ferry, Russellville, Musella, Cross Keys, Knoxville, Wesleyan, Lizella, Arkwright, Franklinton, Sandy Point and Horns. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
